sentences.en: a dazzling display (= very good display ) of flowers
sentences.cn: 令人目眩神迷的花卉展

sentences.en: All the exam results will be displayed on the noticeboard.
sentences.cn: 所有的考试成绩将在布告板上公布。

sentences.en: By law all restaurants must display their prices outside.
sentences.cn: 根据法律，所有餐厅都必须在店外明示用餐价格。

sentences.en: He doesn't have to go through this elaborate display for my benefit!
sentences.cn: 他不必为了我作这么详细的展示！

sentences.en: It is not unknown for valuable display items to go, ahem, missing.
sentences.cn: 贵重的展品，呃哼，丢失的话，会众人皆知。

sentences.en: It was an incredible display of motherly love and forgiveness.
sentences.cn: 那是慈母般关爱与宽容的了不起的表现。

sentences.en: It was unlike Gordon to display his feelings.
sentences.cn: 戈登不太可能表露他的情感。

sentences.en: Normally, such an outward display of affection is reserved for his mother.
sentences.cn: 通常，只有在母亲面前他的情感才会如此外露。

sentences.en: shop windows displaying the latest fashions
sentences.cn: 展示最新时装的商店橱窗

sentences.en: ten piano pieces, each written to display the talents of individual players
sentences.cn: 十首钢琴曲，每一首都为了展示演奏者的才华而作

sentences.en: The chart can then display the links connecting these groups.
sentences.cn: 这张图就会显示出这些群体之间的关联。

sentences.en: The display of prehistoric monsters is comically naive.
sentences.cn: 史前怪物的展览幼稚可笑。

sentences.en: The evening ended with a dramatic display of fireworks.
sentences.cn: 晚会以五彩斑斓的焰火表演结束。

sentences.en: The exhibition gives local artists an opportunity to display their work.
sentences.cn: 这次展览为当地艺术家提供了展示自己作品的机会。

sentences.en: The most pleasurable experience of the evening was the wonderful fireworks display.
sentences.cn: 这个晚上最让人高兴的就是精彩的焰火表演。

sentences.en: The press continued its jingoistic display.
sentences.cn: 报刊继续大力鼓吹沙文主义。

sentences.en: The window display caught her eye.
sentences.cn: 橱窗陈列吸引了她的目光。

sentences.en: This time the display flashed a red warning signal.
sentences.cn: 这次显示器上闪烁着红色的警报信号。

sentences.en: Using the option to display only text speeds things up a lot.
sentences.cn: 选用纯文本显示可以使速度大幅提升。

sentences.en: Where the show really excites is in the display of avant-garde photography.
sentences.cn: 那场展览真正令人激动的就是先锋派摄影的展示。

sentences.en: Yuri gave a copybook display.
sentences.cn: 尤里的表演堪称完美。
